channel.title: Please help me?
channel.description: :confused: I need help for a few things. First off, i am wondering how to change starting area (where u start out at). Then how do i make it so you get more experience when you train?.. and how u add bonuses to weapons! im using slipknot source. thanks alot if you help me out!! once this server is done, hopefully everyone will like it =].

item.title: Please help me?
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

search initial x and y coordinates in player.java, donâ€™t change the height, only change the other two coordinates

item.title: Please help me?
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

changing starting area is in player.java, just search the coords in that file, experience you can find in client.java, search the exp it gives you per hit, item bonuses are in item.cfg

Read full topic
